perturbation.original_text: This AGREEMENT (the "AGREEMENT") entered into as of the 19 day of March, 2004 (the "EFFECTIVE DATE") provides the terms and conditions under which MediaNet Group Technologies, Inc., a Nevada corporation having an address at 5100 W. Copans Road Suite 710 Margate, FL 33063 USA ("MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES"), authorizes International Direct Response, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation, having an address at 1125 Lancaster Avenue, Berwyn, PA 19312("RESELLER") to be its true and lawful representative and agent for the purpose of reselling licenses of the MediaNet Group Technologies Portals ("PORTALS") and other MediaNet Group Technologies products and services in accordance with the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement. This Agreement, together with the other agreements and schedules referenced in it, contains the complete terms and conditions between the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: This AGREEMENT (the "CONTRACT") entered into as of the 19 day of March, 2004 (the "START DATE") provides the terms and conditions under which MediaNet Group Technologies, Inc., a Nevada corporation having an address at 5100 W. Copans Road Suite 710 Margate, FL 33063 USA ("MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES"), authorizes International Direct Response, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation, having an address at 1125 Lancaster Avenue, Berwyn, PA 19312("MARKETER") to be its true and lawful representative and agent for the purpose of reselling licenses of the MediaNet Group Technologies Portals ("PORTALS") and other MediaNet Group Technologies products and services in accordance with the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement. This Agreement, together with the other agreements and schedules referenced in it, contains the complete terms and conditions between the parties.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'AGREEMENT' to 'CONTRACT', 'EFFECTIVE DATE' to 'START DATE' and 'RESELLER' to 'MARKETER' creates confusion as the document inconsistently refers to the same concepts with different terms. The original definition aims to establish clear terminology, but the edited version undermines this by using the terms interchangeably, potentially leading to interpretational ambiguities and disputes over the intended meaning.

perturbation.original_text:
Resellers are licensed to market the Brand-A-Port applications and receive commission on all product sales plus residual income on hosting/maintenance fees as outlined on the Compensation Schedule attached hereto.

The MediaNet Group Technologies Reseller Plan is free to join. Under the plan, resellers market and promote MediaNet Group Technologies's software product range to their existing customer base and the general Internet community. By referring a customer to the MediaNet Group Technologies web site, the reseller receives a commission for customer's purchase of the MediaNet Group Technologies Brand-A-Port software.
perturbation.changed_text:
Distributors are licensed to market the Brand-A-Port applications and receive compensation on all product sales plus residual income on hosting/maintenance fees as outlined on the Compensation Schedule attached hereto.

The MediaNet Group Technologies Marketer Program is free to join. Under the program, marketers market and promote MediaNet Group Technologies's software product range to their existing customer base and the general Internet community. By referring a customer to the MediaNet Group Technologies web site, the distributor receives a commission for customer's purchase of the MediaNet Group Technologies Brand-A-Port software.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the first instance of 'Resellers' to 'Distributors' and 'Reseller Plan' to 'Marketer Program' creates ambiguity because later in the same paragraph 'distributor' and 'marketers' are used again. It is unclear if these terms refer to the same role/entity defined earlier as 'RESELLER'. This inconsistent use of terminology creates uncertainty in the obligations and rights of each party.

perturbation.original_text:
WE BELIEVE THAT EACH REPRESENTATIVE AND RESELLER WILL SEE THE BENEFITS OF THIS PROGRAM AND THE PROTECTION IT AFFORDS THEM.

APPROVED AND ACCEPTED BY THE SIGNATORY PARTIES BELOW THIS __ OF ________, 200__.

MediaNet Group Technologies, Inc.             ________________________

Accepted by: __________________________    Accepted by:__________________                Chief Executive Officer               Title:
perturbation.changed_text:
WE BELIEVE THAT EACH REPRESENTATIVE AND SUPPLIER WILL SEE THE BENEFITS OF THIS PROGRAM AND THE PROTECTION IT AFFORDS THEM.

APPROVED AND ACCEPTED BY THE SIGNATORY PARTIES BELOW THIS __ OF ________, 200__.

MediaNet Group Technologies, Inc.             ________________________

Accepted by: __________________________    Accepted by:__________________                Chief Executive Officer               Title:
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'RESELLER' to 'SUPPLIER' creates a contradiction. The agreement identifies the 'RESELLER' in the opening paragraph, but here it is swapped for 'SUPPLIER.' This change introduces uncertainty regarding which entity is bound by the agreement's terms, leading to enforcement issues.
perturbation.location: PROCEDURE FOR REGISTERING PROSPECTIVE CLIENTS, MEMBER PROVIDERS/ MERCHANTS/MERCHANT MEMBER PROVIDERS
